name: Lost in Translation (PotatoDog1, kkl_ffsou, Franny Dancis, emitimes14)
name_original: Lost in Translation (PotatoDog1, kkl_ffsou, Franny Dancis, emitimes14)
description:
A choose your own adventure game with visual elements and interactable items strongly guided by narrative. You play as a nondescript man that makes a physical as well as an emotional journey through the actions you make.

Please play in the Google Chrome browser.
